text: @ABC GOP says they have covid-19 in check yet potus is asking attendees to sign a waiver to go to his rally.  Use your common sense folks. THINK! Think for yourself. This man is out for himself & you are just collateral damage. Take your life back & make choices in YOUR best interest.
